Package ohos.wearable.complication

Provides classes to implement watch complications.

Complication are components used to display data on the watch face.

Since:
5
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Complication
    Defines complication data types.
    ComplicationCallback
    Sends complication data to the watch face.
    ComplicationDataRefresh
    Notifies the watch face to refresh complication data.
    ComplicationEntity
    Provides methods related to complication data.
    ComplicationEntity.Builder
    A builder class for ComplicationEntity objects.
    ComplicationProviderAbility
    A base class for implementing complication data refresh.
    ComplicationTemplate
    Defines complication templates.
    ListValue
    Provides methods related to a ListValue object.
    RangedValue
    Provides methods related to a RangedValue object which consists of the maximum, minimum, and current values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Complication.Type
    Enumerates complication types.
    ComplicationTemplate.Type
    Enumerates types of complication templates.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalFieldException
    Represents the exception that will be thrown upon an illegal field.
    IllegalListValueException
    Represents the exception that will be thrown upon an illegal ListValue object.
    IllegalRangedArgumentException
    Represents the exception that will be thrown upon an illegal RangedValue object.
    IllegalTemplateException
    Represents the exception that will be thrown upon an illegal complication template type.
    IllegalValueException
    Represents the exception that will be thrown upon an illegal value.
    MissRequiredFieldException
    Represents the exception that will be thrown when required fields are missing in a specified complication template.
